ldJson.name: MangoAGS
ldJson.description: MangoAGS  is an eCommerce platform integrating Amazon's API to enhance shopping with real-time data.

heroData.title: We empower companies to elevate their revenue to unprecedented levels: Welcome to
heroData.subTitle: Take advantage of Amazon's API for a seamless shopping experience. Access real -time product data, inventory and evaluate easily. Optimize ads, take advantage of AI to analyze data from Big Data.

services.title: Professional Templates
services.description: Our templates are crafted by experienced web designers, ensuring a modern and polished look for your site. From typography to element design, every detail is carefully considered to convey a professional image.

services.title: Integrated Accessibility
services.description: We care about web accessibility and have integrated features to ensure your site is accessible to all users, including those with visual or motor disabilities. Our templates comply with WCAG accessibility standards to provide an inclusive experience for everyone.

services.title: SEO-Optimized
services.description: Our templates are optimized for SEO, meaning they are structured and coded to be easily indexed by Google and other search engines, improving your ranking in search results.

services.title: Amazon API Integration
services.description: Our platform integrates Amazon's API to provide real-time data on product availability, pricing, and reviews. This ensures that our customers get accurate information when shopping with us, enhancing trust and improving the shopping experience.

services.title: Amazon Optimize Ads
services.description: We offer Amazon Ads Optimization Service to help your business enhance its advertising effectiveness on the Amazon platform. With our expertise and advanced technology, we are committed to providing you with the best solutions to attract customers and increase sales.

adventajesData.title: Unlock the Power of Our Technologies:                             Discover the Key Benefits

adventajes.title: Take Your Idea to Perfection
adventajes.description: Our options for your intuitive intuitive empower you to create a prominent outfit and resonate with your audience than ever. Say goodbye to the available designs and hello to a real world page that reflects your vision and personality.
adventajes.imageAlt: this is an image about the template of POD

adventajes.title: Reach the Top of Trending
adventajes.description: In the world of e-commerce, trends move fast. To stay relevant and successful, your products need to be at the forefront of what's hot. That's where our Print on Demand (POD) service comes in - empowering creators like you to Reach the Top of Trending with ease.
adventajes.imageAlt: this is an image about top of trending

adventajes.title: Real-Time Data with Amazon SP-API
adventajes.description: With real-time data from Amazon's API, we ensure the information our customers rely on whether it's pricing, availability, or product reviews is always accurate and up to date. Build trust and enhance the user experience with the power of Amazon.
adventajes.imageAlt: this is an image about the Amazon API adventajes

adventajes.title: Security Data with Amazon Ads API
adventajes.description: Protect your advertising campaigns with Amazon Ads API's robust security features. Enjoy advanced authentication, data encryption, and strict access controls to keep your sensitive data safe. Integrate security seamlessly into your strategy and focus on maximizing ROI with confidence.
adventajes.imageAlt: this is an image about the Amazon API adventajes

tiers.title: Starter
tiers.description: Amazon Ads for Indivisual and Small Businesses
features: Basic Marketing Solutions for Amazon Sellers

tiers.title: Professional
tiers.description: Advanced Amazon Ads for Growing Brands
features: Optimized Ad Campaigns for Business Growth
Boost Sales with Targeted Amazon Ads

footerData.description: We ensure complete transparency and security in our integration with Amazon's API, offering our customers accurate and reliable data in a safe online environment.
